property.description: 3 Bath,Semi-Furnished,8 floor,South facing Presenting a fabulous 2BHK residential ready to move flat for sale in Golf Course, Greater Noida. Golf Course being one of the plush residential areas of Noida beckons you with tranquil and serene ambience. This 2-bedroom abode is a masterpiece offering you luxurious and a high standard of living. Hurry up! buy this flat and enjoy the experience of a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.Property Specifications  Nicely maintained in pristine condition this abode sprawling over a super area of 2875 sqft and 2000 sqft carpet area is placed on the 8th floor. Standing in a 16 story tall tower, this 2BHK flat is comfortably placed to enjoy all the seasons of the year. The sleek and decent interior decors and the appealing home plan make this abode worthy of your attention. Adhering to the precious vaastu norms, this flat is bestowed with a positive and blissful home ambiance. Also, as positioned on a higher floor this abode enjoys the maximum fresh air and natural light all day. Well-designed and configured, this flat comprises 2 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, powder room, 2 balconies, dining cum living room, kitchen and a servant room. The exquisitely designed bedrooms are tucked in with wardrobes and ensuite bathrooms are outfitted with geysers and premium fittings. Both the washrooms and the powder room are fashioned in western style. The spacious and well-designed hall opens onto the balconies giving beautiful views of the verdant golf course and surroundings. The stunning kitchenette is fashioned in a modular style and equipped with a chimney to absorb the heat & odour. Further, the impressive and easy to maintain vitrified tiles adds on to the elegance of this abode. FacilitiesTo ensure utmost comfort and convenience to its residents, this residential adobe is provided with access to modern amenities like a gymnasium, swimming pool, clubhouse, kids play area, meditation room, sports courts, and many other modern facilities. In addition, this apartment comes with one covered car parking space and is provided with 24hours water supply and 100% power backup. Security is also provided round the clock by the appointed manned security.LocalityLocated near the Pari chowk, this fantastic locality enjoys equally fantastic connectivity to all the major parts of the city, social amenities and commuter hubs. Hardly within a stretch of 500m to 1km, you can find medical aids, shopping destinations, schools, colleges, banks, ATMs, etc., thus, making your daily life easier. The metro station lies at a distance of 500m from here as well as autos, taxis, etc., are also easily available.

property.description: 2 Bath,Unfurnished,14 floor,South facing Ready to move in- this 2BHK flat located in GC 5 Gaur City 1 Noida Extension, Greater Noida is available for sale. Widely spread across a super area of 860sqft, this flat has south facing entrance which helps you live a life that is free from any kind of disturbance. Property Specifications Positioned on the 14th floor of a high raised 15 floor multi-storeyed building, this flat is unfurnished and comprises 2 bedrooms, living cum dining area and 2 bathrooms. Out of the 2 western designed bathrooms 1 is attached to the bedroom and the other one is in common. There are geyser points in the bathrooms for the owner to install geysers in the future. Out of the 2 balconies one is attached to the living cum dining area and the other one is attached to the bedroom which provides you with an overlooking of the park. The kitchen in this flat is well built in normal concept with cabinets and an Aqua Guard. There is wooden flooring in the bedroom and ceramic tile flooring in the rest of the flat whereas the entire flat is well equipped with electrical fixtures making the owner's work easy. Facilities Round the clock water supply, 100% power back up and open parking space for one vehicle are provided to the owner of this flat. A security guard is appointed who is present 24x7 for the safety of the building premise and the residents. Also there is a lift available for the residents to reach to their desired floor easily. Locality Local markets and small shops available inside the premise itself which makes it convenient for the residents to shop easily. Gaurs International School is located at a distance of 1.5-2km from this locality. For any kind of medical assistance, Uttam Hospital is situated at 5km from this flat. Noida Electronic City Railway Station is located at a distance of 7km whereas the other public transport such as taxis, autos and buses are easily available in the close vicinity. Nationalised banks and ATMs are also accessible in the near proximity from this locality.

This property in Techzone 4 is under construction and the possession of the same would be by December 2021. Property Specification                                                                                                        Immaculately presented, this 3BHK flat is expediently positioned on the 8th floor in a high raised tower with total 22-floors. All the bedrooms of this house open onto wide and airy balconies whereas the fourth balcony is attached to the hall that overlook the nearby market. You can spend quality leisure time with family and also relax after a long and tiring day. Further, all the bathrooms are designed in western fashion among which 1 is attached to a bedroom while the other one is available for common use. Further, the vitrified tile flooring flawlessly finished in the entire house make this property look aesthetically more appealing. property.name: 2 BHK Apartment for Sale in Gaur City 5th Avenue, Noida Extension
property.description: 2 Bath,Semi-Furnished,7 floor An extremely decent and well-crafted, this 2BHK flat is available for sale. Located in the fine society of “Gaur City” 5th Avenue, Noida Extension, Greater Noida, this flat provides you with all the basic as well as modern amenities necessary for a happy and extraordinary living.  Property Specifications Good location, great infrastructure and well-executed floor plan make this flat an ultimate investment. Bathed in plenty of sunlight and cross-ventilation, this residence gives you a bright and tranquil atmosphere. It is positioned on the 7th floor in a tower of total 12 floors and spreads across a super area of 1050sqft.  This flat is inclusive of 2 bedrooms with attached western designed bathrooms, 3 balconies, living cum dining room and a modular kitchen with a chimney. The bedrooms are well furnished with wardrobes whereas the bathrooms are fitted with geyser points for the installation of the same. Offering you with an unmatched view of the beautiful garden, 2 of the balconies are attached to the bedrooms whereas the other one is attached to the living room. Moreover, to give the home ambience a rich appeal, the flooring is decked with a combination of wooden in the master bedroom and vitrified tiles in the rest of the area. Facilities  A security guard is appointed for the safety of the residents as well as the building premise. Basic facilities such as round the clock water supply, 100% power backup and covered parking space are provided to the residents of this flat.  Other modern amenities including- conference room, rain water harvesting, kids play area, kids play pool with water slides, banquet hall, library and business centre, swimming pool, intercom facility, flower gardens, event space & amphitheatre, fire fighting equipment, club house, cafeteria/food court, meditation area, indoor games room, gymnasium, RO water system, indoor squash & badminton court, park, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, aerobics room, piped gas, lift, sports complex and cricket stadium are also available. Locality  Avenue Market is situated just opposite to this property making it easy for the residents to shop everything and anything under one roof. The reputed Gaur International School GNW is located at a distance of 1.5km. Reliable Health Care Hospital is situated at a distance of 3km which would help you with any kind of medical emergencies. Ghaziabad Junction Railway Station is located at 5km whereas the airport at 25-30km from this locality. Prominent banks and ATM centres are accessible in the close vicinity.

property.name: 8 BHK Penthouse for Sale in Royal Apartments, Sigma 4
property.description: 5 Bath,Semi-Furnished,3 floor,East facing Situated in Royal Apartments, Sigma 4 of Greater Noida is a meticulously crafted 8BHK Penthouse available for sale. If you have been planning to make a worthwhile investment of your valuable money, then considering this property is without a doubt a clever choice. So, what are you waiting for!!!Property SpecificationReady to move in, this amazing 8BHK penthouse covering an area of 4200sqft is spread over the third and fourth floors which are interconnected by an internal stairway. Blessed with abundant natural light and fresh air, this penthouse offers a serene ambiance to live in so owning this property to settle down with family is truly a wise decision.Coming to the floor plan, the third floor of this penthouse features 3 luxurious bedrooms adorned with wardrobes, 3 western themed bathrooms, a spacious living cum dining room, drawing room, and kitchen fitted with cabinets, platform & sink. Moreover, one of the bedrooms here has a dressing room as well. Further, of the 3 chic bathrooms here; 2 are attached to the bedrooms and the remaining is commonly accessible.Moving to the 4th floor, it is inclusive of 5 spacious bedrooms, 2 en-suite western style bathrooms, a pantry, hall, and 2 wide balconies that commonly adjoin all 5 bedrooms. One can relax and enjoy the unblocked views of the clubhouse, pool and garden from these balconies.The flooring immaculately topped up with classy vitrified tiles all over the residence adds more grace to the overall aesthetic appeal.FacilitiesThis residential property is benefitted with some of the modern amenities like reserved parking, meditation area, jogging and strolling track, swimming pool, cycling & jogging track, water storage, gym, indoor games room, multipurpose courts, fire-fighting equipment, maintenance staff, and clubhouse.Additionally, prime facilities like 24hours water supply, CCTV camera for extra surveillance and tight security are provided as well. Residents need not worry about the placement of vehicles as open parking space is available where 2 cars can be placed comfortably.LocalitySited just 4km away from the prestigious Honda Factory, this residential property enjoys excellent connectivity via various public transport services and even the local bus stop is close by and metro station is 8-10km away. So, commuting will be much smoother for the residents here. Well-known shopping malls, supermarket, local market, primary and high schools are accessible within the radius of 2-3km while hospitals, banks and ATMs are within the vicinity.
